name: Ainda | Chest of drawers - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: The night-time section of Ceccotti Collezioni is completed by Ainda, a chest of drawers with four drawers. It was designed by Roberto Lazzeroni in 2004 and is made of solid American walnut, with an elegant style that is in keeping with the brand as a whole. Characterised by sinuous lines, it features perfect ovals thanks to precise manufacturing techniques. The legs on which it rests lend the overall form a feeling of lightness. For a complete set, it can be accompanied by the Ainda bedside table.
